Disease.Name: ASPHYXIA [DD]
Disease.Gene:
---Detail information to gene locus by the National Center for Biotechnology Information NCBI:
MAJOR HISTOCOMPATIBILITY COMPLEX
Disease.Summary: the effects of birth asphyxia on the urinary organic acid profile of term newborns with birth asphyxia was investigated: significant abnormalities were found for the severely asphyxiated newborns

symtomp.symptom: bleeding tendencies, hemorrhages / bleeding tendencies, hemorrhage

symtomp.category: LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM | NERVOUS SYSTEM
